item.title: Joint Secretary of DFS reviews progress of schemes in Yadgir and Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Joint Secretary in the Department of Financial Services (DFS) of the Union government Sameer Shukla reviewed the progress of the Aspirational District Programme in Yadgir and Raichur on Friday.
He said that the Centre has selected 112 districts in the country. The government targeted achievement and accorded 49 indexes in health, education, nutrition, agriculture, water resources, economic inclusion, skill development, and basic infrastructure. â€œOfficers of departments concerned should make eff...]]>
